title: Task
description: A task represents a unit of work within a project, with status tracking and relationships to sessions, skills, and agents

projectId.description: ID of the project this task belongs to

parentId.description: ID of the parent task for hierarchical task relationships, null if top-level

title.description: Brief, descriptive title of the task

description.description: Detailed description of what needs to be accomplished
examples: Implement OAuth 2.0 authentication flow with support for Google and GitHub providers

createdAt.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the task was created

updatedAt.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the task was last updated

startedAt.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when work on the task started, null if not yet started

completedAt.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the task was completed, null if not yet completed

initialPrompt.description: The initial prompt or instruction that created this task
examples: Build a login page with email and password fields

sessionIds.description: Array of session IDs working on this task (many-to-many relationship)

skillIds.description: Array of skill identifiers assigned to this task

agentIds.description: Array of agent identifiers assigned to this task

dependencies.description: Array of task IDs that must be completed before this task can start

timeline.description: Chronological array of events in the task's lifecycle
